resources.string: Enter Old Password For Ex Xyz@123
Enter New Password For Ex Xyz@123
Shop No A 4, Pramukh Arcade 2, Kudasan, Gandhinagar-Gujarat - 382421, Below Hotel City In

Jalaram Book Store is Gandinagar’s Largest Books Store. We are in this Business more than 25 years. Our main aim is to Help Peoples to get their Achievement.Jalaram Book Store is one stop solution for all book readers, or Students who are preparing for Government Exam. We have largest book Collection. More than 25000+ books are listed in our Store.

Shipping Charges: A fixed shipping charge of Rs. 45 is applicable on all orders below Or Equal Rs. 500/- (Excluding COD charges, Shipping charges, Taxes or value reduced after application of coupons or any other offer)\n

Estimated Delivery Time: For all areas serviced by reputed couriers, the delivery time would be within 3 to 4 business days of shipping (business days exclude Sundays and other holidays). However, items weighing over 2 kilos or high volume may take a couple of days longer to reach. For other areas the products will be shipped through Indian Postal Service and may take 1-2 weeks depending on location.\n

Address Change: You can change the delivery address of your order only if the order is in Confirmed or Pending status and none of the item(s) purchased in the order are shipped. However, if there are any variations in the charges/taxes (if any) applied for the original delivery address used while placing the order v/s the delivery address to be updated, the request for updating the delivery address might not be accepted.\n
Hidden Charges (Sales tax, Octroi etc): You will get the final price during check out. Our prices are all inclusive and you need not pay anything extra.\n
International Locations: Currently we do not deliver to locations outside India\n

Tracking Packages: We will mail you the name of the courier company and the tracking number of your consignment in your registered email address. In case you do not receive a mail from us within 48hrs of placing an order please check your spam folder. Tracking may not appear online for up to another 48 hours in some cases, so please wait until your package is scanned by the courier company.\n

Non-availability on Delivery: Our delivery partners will attempt to deliver the package thrice before it is returned back to our warehouse. Please provide your mobile number in the delivery address as it will help in making a faster delivery.\n\n* Valid only for owned stock. Shipping time may increase for third party shipments.
For Refund & Cancellation Order Query. Please Contact to Supporting Department \n\nEmail Address:- info@jalarambookstore.com

At Jalaram Book Store, our aim is to provide 100% satisfaction to our customers. If for any reason you are not satisfied with the product, we are here to help. Following are the details of the return policy that is applicable for all the items sold on Jalaram Book Store:

For Return Purchase Order Query. Please Contact to Supporting Department 
Email Address:- info@jalarambookstore.com
Contact Number:- +8141738284
